Develop and test automation scripts for each stage of the 3D mesh workflow, ensuring compatibility with both Mac and Windows platforms.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Automation scripts are available and functional for each workflow stage
- Scripts are tested on both Mac and Windows
- Documentation is provided for usage and extensibility

## Additional Notes

As a user, I want the system to automatically create an actor in Unreal Engine from my MetaHuman asset so that I can use it in my project without manual setup.

- Created actor is validated and ready for use
